meanings.definition: Used to indicate that a statement explains or supports a previous statement
meanings.sent1: She didn't like the movie, anyway it was too long.
meanings.sent2: He didn't want to go out, anyway he had work to do.
meanings.sent3: The store was closed, anyway she found what she needed online.
meanings.sent4: He didn't have the key, anyway he managed to open the door.
